alert.note: Alert for Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 17 at 11:40AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...MINOR COASTAL FLOODING STILL OCCURRING EARLY THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Less than one foot of inundation above ground level in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Water levels had just peaked beneath moderate flood thresholds. Minor flooding is still expected in vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline into early this afternoon.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
